tool_description: ScrAPI is a full-featured and flexible web scraping service with a focus on privacy.
name: ScrAPI
title: ScrAPI

api_list.name: Available Country List
api_list.description: Get a list of available country codes that can be used as the proxy country parameter for geotargeting.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scrapi5.p.rapidapi.com/v1/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scrapi5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scrapi5.p.rapidapi.com/v1/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scrapi5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Credit Balance
api_list.description: Get the current balance for your API key. When using the test API key (or no API key) this just returns a random number of credits.

api_list.name: Scrape URL
api_list.description:
GET method to perform a web scraping operation using the provided URL.  
Browser commands are not available using this method.

optional_parameters.name: responseFormat
optional_parameters.description: The type of API response. | 0 = JSON, 1 = HTML |

optional_parameters.name: proxyCountry
optional_parameters.description:
The proxy country to use if you require the scrape request to come from.
Use https://api.scrapi.dev/v1/countries to get a list of valid country codes.

optional_parameters.name: proxyType
optional_parameters.description: The type of the proxy to use for the scrape request. | 0 = None, 1 = Free, 2 = Residential, 3 = DataCenter, 4 = Tor |

optional_parameters.name: cookies
optional_parameters.description: A key/value pair list of cookies to provide in the scrape request (format: cookie1=value1;cookie2=value2;).

optional_parameters.name: headers
optional_parameters.description: A key/value pair list of headers to provide in the scrape request (format: header1=value1;header2=value2;).

optional_parameters.name: solveCaptchas
optional_parameters.description: Indicate whether you want to attempt to solve any captchas detected on the page. Will automatically enable using a browser.

optional_parameters.name: apiKey
optional_parameters.description: API Key to avoid free usage limitations.

optional_parameters.name: useBrowser
optional_parameters.description: Indicate whether you want to use a full headless browser (will execute JavaScript) or just a regular web client call to retrieve the response (faster but no JavaScript).

optional_parameters.name: callbackUrl
optional_parameters.description: A URL that the response data will the POSTed to once complete.

api_list.name: Check Callback Status
api_list.description:
Get the status of a scrape request with a callback URL specified. The status is cached for 10 minutes after which it will always return "Unknown" for a reference. Nothing about the callback is stored except the status as it's executing.

| Status | Code |
| --- | --- |
| Unknown | 0 |
| Scheduled | 1 |
| Busy | 2 |
| Error | 3 |
| Complete | 4 |
